name: Planet Omnia
description:
Welcome to the World Of Planet Omnia

  • Have a laugh with your friends in this crazy, expanding world!
  • Tons of secrets to discover and unlock!
  • A huge selection of colours and accessories to customise your character, express yourself!
  • In Game VOIP! Hear your friends talking as if they were right there!
  • Items, weapons, spells and more to experiment and have fun with!

Character customization

  • Choose from a wide range of accessories, make your character the way you want it!
  • Find hidden accessories scattered around the map, and unlock them to flex on your friends.
